Generation V.Black: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Generation V.White: They use concrete pillars as walking canes. They know moves that enable them to swing the pillars freely in battle.
Generation V.Black 2: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
Generation V.White 2: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

Generation VI.X: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Generation VI.Y: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

Generation VIII.Sword: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
Generation VIII.Shield: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Generation IX.Violet: Rather than rely on their strength, they master moves that make good use of centrifugal force to swing around concrete.
